title: Wooden Hammer
summaries: The Wooden Hammer is the lowest tier of hammer available, just below the Copper Hammer.

It offers beginning players an easily obtainable means of removing <linked>background walls</linked> and shaping <linked>blocks</linked>, as players are not automatically given a hammer on character creation (except on <linked>Journey Mode</linked>, in which they are given an <linked>Iron Hammer</linked>), the way they are for the other essential construction tools (<linked>axe</linked> and <linked>pickaxe</linked>).
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and either Agile or Forceful/Strong for combat purposes, due to its unusually low base damage.

statistics.Sell: 10 CC
